author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Looks like the damn has burst. Microsoft has announced that prices for Xbox hardware—including consoles and peripherals—will be going up, along with first-party game prices. The new prices vary, but if you haven't already purchased an Xbox Series X or S, expect to pay at least $100 more. It also places the very premium Series X 2TB Galaxy Special Edition at a higher price point than the already expensive PlayStation 5 Pro, without any enhanced hardware specs to show for it. And you can expect to pay around $80 for new first-party Xbox games like the next Call of Duty and the Perfect Dark reboot. In other news, the Epic Games v Apple saga might be coming to a close. A federal judge has ruled in Epic Games' favor, which paves the way for Fortnite to land back on iOS devices after a five-year hiatus. And finally, Helldivers 2 has plenty of updates planned, and developer Arrowhead's CEO is teasing that they'll make you s*** your pants. That's a direct quote.

#IGN #G
title: Xbox Raises Prices on Hardware and Games - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Having trouble with the Grosse Tete optional boss in Expedition 33? Have we got the boss guide for you! We’re gonna give two different methods, but just a warning, there are endgame spoilers in the back half of this video. We’ll start with the non-spoilery method you can use as soon as you find the boss in Act 2, but for alternate methods, we’ll need to spoil some endgame elements. Here’s how to beat Grosse Tete in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33.

Timecodes
00:00 - Intro
00:36 - Where to Find It
01:06 - Method 1 (Survive through 12th turn)
02:55 - SPOILER WARNING
03:05 - Second Method (Endgame)
07:06 - Rewards
07:30 - Outro

#IGN #Gaming
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - How to Beat Grosse Tete (Boss Guide)

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Paradise Records trailer for this upcoming movie inspired by iconic 90’s comedies like Clerks, Friday and Barbershop. Rapper/singer Logic wrote, directed, produced and stars in Paradise Records. Logic plays the owner of a record shop who is struggling to keep the business open while bickering and bantering with his employees and oddball customers. The film also stars Tramayne Hudson, Reed Northup and Mary Elizabeth Kelly. It features supporting roles and cameos from people like Kevin Smith (who edited the film and is an EP), Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ron Perlman, Martin Starr, Jason Mewes, David Krumholtz, Tony Revolori, Kevin Corrigan, Juicy J and Bobby Lee.

Paradise Records premieres in the Spotlight Narrative section at Tribeca on Friday, June 6, 2025.
title: Paradise Records - Official Trailer (2025) Logic, Tramayne Hudson, Kevin Smith

description: Watch the Prodigy Gameplay Trailer for Apex Legends, a first-person battle royale shooter developed by Respawn Entertainment. Players can get the rundown on the gameplay elements of Sparrow, the latest Legend to be added to the game. Make use of his Double Jump, Tracker Dart, and more for players to gain the upper hand in intense battles. Sparrow is launching with Apex Legends Prodigy on May 6.
title: Apex Legends - Official Prodigy Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
How do you find yourself on a team of non super non heroes having to fight a near omnipotent force of destruction? Well…it’s a long story that I’m going to shorten for you right now so you don’t have to watch over 30 movies and series to understand how someone gets from defending their skinny dork friend from bullies in World War II to nearly a hundred years later fighting…the Void. 

We’re talking Thunderbolts: how this ragtag team of rejects and anti-villains find themselves together fighting one of the most difficult villains Marvel’s ever produced. We’ll be looking at their full MCU journeys, without alternate What If…? Counterpoints of course, up until where you last saw every single member. We’ll be figuring out what their situations are and maybe, just maybe, we’ll see what magic happens in that simple little asterisk.

#IGN #Marvel #MCU
title: How The Thunderbolts Became Marvel’s Thunderbolts* | MCU Recap

author: IGN
description:
Join director Dean DeBlois, along with stars Mason Thames, Nico Parker and Gerard Butler, for a behind-the-scenes look at How To Train Your Dragon in this latest featurette for the upcoming live-action reimagining of the animated film that launched the franchise. The cast and crew give a peek at how they're bringing Berk to life.

On the rugged isle of Berk, where Vikings and dragons have been bitter enemies for generations, Hiccup (Mason Thames; The Black Phone, For All Mankind) stands apart. The inventive yet overlooked son of Chief Stoick the Vast (Gerard Butler, reprising his voice role from the animated franchise), Hiccup defies centuries of tradition when he befriends Toothless, a feared Night Fury dragon. Their unlikely bond reveals the true nature of dragons, challenging the very foundations of Viking society. 

With the fierce and ambitious Astrid (BAFTA nominee Nico Parker; Dumbo, The Last of Us) and the village’s quirky blacksmith Gobber (Nick Frost; Snow White and the Hunt
title: How To Train Your Dragon - Official Behind-The-Scenes Clip (2025) Mason Thames, Gerard Butler

author: IGN
description:
With the release of The Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion Remastered, we’ve all been reminded that Cyrodil is a vast, open world that’s very easy to get lost in. With 9 major cities, several guilds, and countless quests to undertake, it can be hard to know where to go first after completing the tutorial, so here’s the 9 Best Things to Do First in Oblivion.

00:00 - Intro  
00:25 - Save At the Sewers  
01:20 - Score a Free Place to Sleep (And Store Items)  
03:07 - Join Some Guilds  
04:54 - Find A Fence For Stolen Goods  
05:43 - Clear Some Early Dungeons  
07:10 - Make Some Potions  
07:48 - Get a Free Horse  
08:49 - Take Back Castle Kvatch Early  
10:16 - Have a Way to Deal With Ghosts

#IGN #Gaming
title: Oblivion Remastered: 9 Best Things to Do FIRST

author: IGN
description:
Survive on a mysterious scrap planet, where rusted machinery and broken robots are your only neighbors. Here's your look at the vibrant world of Silicone Heart in this announcement trailer for the upcoming adventure sandbox game. 

Survive on a mysterious scrap planet, where rusted machinery and broken robots are your only neighbors. In this adventure sandbox, you'll recycle resources, repair machines, invent new devices, and even cultivate bizarre plants to uncover the secrets of this strange world.

You are the last human on the planet. To survive, you must pretend to be a robot—or be destroyed. You are the only mechanic, which means you'll become a "healer" for machines—and for some, even a necromancer. After all, who else can bring robots back to life from piles of scrap? Will you find a home here? Build a workshop, unravel the planet’s mysteries, and perhaps save your missing wife—it’s all in your hands.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Silicone Heart - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:

New items are landing in the Shop like the new Porsche 911 GT3 RS Star Wars Bundle featuring Darth Vader, Darth Maul, and Captain Phasma decals. The Star Wars Collaboration runs from May 2 through May 16 in Rocket League.

#RocketLeague #StarWars #Gaming

Flappy Bird is available now via the Epic Games Store for Android.

author: IGN
description:
The Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion hides many secrets and features, and there’s a few things that are easy to miss or overlook when you’re first starting out on your adventure. With the new release of Oblivion Remastered, we’ve decided to compile the 7 Things It Doesn’t Tell You.

Timestamps:
00:00 - Intro
00:18 - 1: Enemies Level Up With You (Enemy Scaling)
01:45 - 2: Beware Vampirism (Cure For Vampirism)
03:47 - 3: How Fame and Infamy Work
05:16 - 4: Don't Commit Crimes Against Guildmates
06:04 - 5: Where To Store Items
07:51 - 6: How To Sell Stolen Items
09:06 - 7: Steal Small Valuables

For more help with Oblivion, check out our expanding wiki for walkthroughs, tips, and an interactive map!
https://www.ign.com/wikis/the-elder-scrolls-iv-oblivion

#TheElderScrolls4Oblivion #Guides #IGN
title: The Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion - 7 Things It Doesn't Tell You

author: IGN
description:
On one miraculous day in rural Wisconsin, the recently deceased suddenly rise from their graves. But this is no zombie story as the “revived” appear and act just like they once were. When local Officer and single mother Dana Cypress is unexpectedly thrown into the center of a brutal murder mystery of her own, she’s left to make sense of the chaos amidst a town gripped by fear and confusion where everyone, alive or undead, is a suspect.

The series stars Melanie Scrofano, Romy Weltman, David James Elliott, and Andy McQueen.

Based on the best selling Image Comics series from Tim Seeley and Mike Norton, the series is created by Aaron B. Koontz and Luke Boyce, who serve as showrunners and executive producers. Lance Samuels, Daniel Iron, Samantha Levine, Neil Tabatznik, Daniel March, Melanie Scrofano, Greg Hemmings, Stephen Foster & Amanda Row also serve as executive producers.

Revival is produced by Blue Ice Pictures and Hemmings Films. 

Revival debuts Thursday, June 12 at 10 p.m. on S
title: Revival - Exclusive Trailer (2025) Melanie Scrofano, Romy Weltman

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Galactic Battle Cinematic Trailer for Fortnite, the hit third-person battle royale game developed by Epic Games. Players and Star Wars fans alike can clash to fight as Galactic Heroes with the Rebellion against the assault led by Emperor Palpatine from the shadows. Explore new locations inspired by iconic Star Wars locales and wield a suite of Lightsabers, Force Abilities, and a range of Blasters. Galactic Battle in Fortnite is launching on May 2 to Fortnite.

#Fortnite #StarWars #Gaming
title: Fortnite - Official Galactic Battle Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description: The explosive popularity of The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered has us once again debating which of Bethesda Game Studios’ role playing games is the best? Some have shown their age more than others, but they’re all genuinely unique in their own way, and bring something different to the table, so we put our heads together to pick a definitive clear cut champion. From the early days of Tamriel in The Elder Scrolls: Arena and its shockingly ambitious sequel, The Elder Scrolls 2: Daggerfall, and through the modern installments we all know and love like Elder Scrolls 3: Morrowind and Skyrim, to Bethesda’s more futuristic RPGs, Fallout 3, Fallout 4, and Fallout 76, plus the most recent addition of Starfield. It sounds like we may very well see a Fallout 3 Remastered or Remake before The Elder Scrolls 6 sees the light of day, and Fallout 5 is still a long long way off, so hopefully this list is as future proof as a radiation-resistant underground vault. No matter what, there’ll surely
title: The Top 9 Open-World RPGs From Bethesda Game Studios

author: IGN
description:
Check out 10 minutes of gameplay from StarRupture and explore the world of Arcadia-7 in this latest video for the upcoming survival and base-building adventure game. The new video shows combat, building, and more.

Dive into Arcadia-7, the stunning yet perilous planet where you, the player, are a prisoner, indebted to serving your sentence and gathering resources for a global corporation that doesn’t care if you live or die, but only if you deliver profit. You are nothing more than an asset.

#IGN #Gaming
title: StarRupture - Official The World of Arcadia-7 Showcase Gameplay

You are a Forest Warden, tasked with harnessing mystical powers and obtaining powerful weapons, all in a bid to defend your homeland from an invasion of deadly Rakshasa demons.

The Age of Bharat is available to wishlist now on both Steam, and Epic Games Store.

#IGN #Gaming #TheAgeOfBhaarat
title: The Age of Bhaarat - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
La Quimera's Early Access version reviewed by Justin Koreis on PC.

La Quimera is bad, but it’s also a perfect example of how even something bad can have a bit of charm. The writing is cringey, the acting is embarrassing, and the middling but serviceable action tends to follow the same basic loop on repeat – but if some friends are riding this partially derailed train with you, there is still some fun to be found here. It doesn’t quite hit “so bad, it’s good” levels of jank, but it could still be a decent candidate for an evening of goofs.

#IGN #Gaming
title: La Quimera Early Access Review

author: IGN
description: Be our guest on a New York City ferry ride that turns into a hilarious nightmare when a mischievous mouse named Steamboat Willie becomes a monstrous reality. As passengers set sail, their trip turns deadly when the tiny terror unleashes murder and mayhem. Packed with big kills, big laughs, and a miniature menace, SCREAMBOAT is a cinematic thrill ride that re-imagines Steamboat Willie like never before!
title: Screamboat - Official Trailer (2025) David Howard Thornton, Allison Pittel, Amy Schumacher
